price: Sunã mĩƙa wa jũnansu a cikinta hinjãlan giya, wadda bãbu yãsassar magana a cikinta, kuma bãbu jin nauyin zunubi.
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
